sourcesContent:
<template>
    <ion-page>
        <ion-header>
            <ion-toolbar>
                <ion-title>iBuy</ion-title>
            </ion-toolbar>
        </ion-header>
        
        <ion-content class="background">
            <ion-img></ion-img>
            <ion-button router-link= "/InsertItems" color="light" size="default" expand="block" fill="solid" class="LoginButton">Entrar com o Google
              <ion-icon name="logo-google"></ion-icon>
            </ion-button>
            <ion-button router-link="/HomePage">Prosseguir</ion-button>

        </ion-content>
    </ion-page>
</template>

<script>
    import {  IonContent, IonHeader, IonPage, IonTitle, IonToolbar, IonImg, IonButton, IonIcon} from '@ionic/vue';
    export default {
      name: 'LoginPage', 
      components: {
          IonContent,
          IonHeader, 
          IonPage, 
          IonTitle, 
          IonToolbar,
          IonImg,
          IonButton,
          IonIcon,
      },
    };
</script>

<style>
  .background{
    --background: #FFFFFF url('../../public/assets/borders.png') no-repeat center center / cover !important;

  }
  .LoginButton{
    /*-moz-animation: ;border: 2px solid #1B4C81;
    color:#1B4C81;*/
    bottom: 128px;
    text-align: center;
    position: absolute;
    filter: drop-shadow(0px 4px 4px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.25));
    --border-radius: 20px;
    --border-color: #1B4C81;
    --border-width: 2px;
    font-size: 16px;
  }
</style>
